text: Name: dorothy dorothy

SUMMARY

Over 7+ years of Experienced  Sr. Business Analyst/ Data Analyst   and functional design, coordination, testing, reporting, acceptance, and Agile Scrum methodology strong knowledge of System Development Life Cycle (SDLC) using Waterfall
Extensive knowledge of Object Oriented Analysis and Design (OOAD) using UML and Rational Unified Process (RUP).
Thorough Knowledge of implementing RUP in all the phases Inception, Elaboration, Construction and Transition of a project.
Proficient in identifying, documenting and analyzing business requirements specifications (BRS), System Design Specifications (SDS) and Software Requirement Specification (SRS).
Three years of payer healthcare with healthcare mandate implementation 4010 to 5010 & ICD9 to ICD10, Medicare, Medicaid, PBM and Affordable Care Act 2010/Obama Care areas.
Expertise in B2B standards, Implementation of Integrated EDI and XML applications and Enterprise Application Integration (EAI) for business processes across applications.
Strong understanding of various SDLC methodologies such as RUP, Waterfall and Agile with hands on experience in all of them
Work collaboratively across geography with business stakeholders and cross-functional team to deliver projects as per Scrum’s Rules, Roles, Artifacts and Events.

Experienced in documenting requirement using Unified Modeling Language (Use Case and Activity Diagrams). Also building business Process Flow, Context Diagrams, Sequence Diagram, Activity Diagrams, Class Diagrams using Rational tools and Microsoft Visio

Knowledge in the ETL (Extract, Transform and Load) of data into a data ware house/date mart and Business Intelligence (BI) tools like Business Objects Modules (Reporter, Supervisor, Designer, and Web Intelligence).

Extensive exposure in business and systems analysis roles identifying problems and/or opportunities and defining solutions through direct involvement in all facets of the software development project lifecycle and thorough experience in client interaction

Sound knowledge of Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (PPACA), HIX (Health Insurance Exchange), Sarbanes-Oxley Act (SOX), ACORD, SOPs (Standard operating Procedures) and forms, GMP’s terms and Practices

Proficient in creating UML diagrams including Use Case Diagrams, Behavioral Diagrams (Sequence Diagrams, Collaboration Diagrams, Activity Diagrams and State Chart Diagrams), Class Diagrams and Data Flow Diagrams (DFD).
Hands on experience in business analysis, eliciting requirements, translating, simplifying requirements and producing project feasibility reports.
Detail oriented and strong project management skills coupled with excellent knowledge of SDLC, Agile Processes and SCRUM.
Managed multiple projects concurrently by effective liaising with the functional, technical, infrastructure teams and end users in delivering project in agreed upon time schedules and within budgets.
TECHNICAL SKILLS
Business Skills: Business Process Analysis & Design, Gap Analysis, Impact Analysis, JAD/JRP Sessions Requirement Gathering, and Use Case Modeling
Scrum Master / Agile Project Manager, UML, Visio, RUP, Waterfall, Data flows, SDLC

Transfer projects from Waterfall to Scrum are major responsibility.
Experience with data migration (ETL development), document data manipulation processes and scripts.
